pages.title: Crafting Stone Blocks
pages.text: $(br)$(l)Ornamental Stone Blocks!$()$(br2)$(#FF9900)Stone blocks$() in Nekoration is made through the process of $(#00BEFF)stone cutting$(), just like many other stone blocks.

pages.title: Stone Cutting
pages.description: $(#55EE00)$(t:Full cubes)Full stone blocks$() in $(#FF9900)Nekoration$() are cut from smooth stone, and the $(#00CC22)$(t:Base & Base Bottom)base type$() can then be used to make stone decors.
